segments.text: May I try on this pair of shoes ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course . What is your size ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . I'll get it for you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Hmm , I don't feel very comfortable .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Try this one , please . This is made of real leather and is very soft . How is it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This is just right for me . I'll take this one .
segments.speaker: S1
